mapper.sql: A.id AS id,A.serial AS serial,A.main_status AS mainStatus,A.logic_status AS logicStatus,A.type_id AS typeId,A.type_code AS typeCode,A.deleted_at AS deletedAt,A.deleted_by AS deletedBy,A.group_id AS groupId,A.grade_id AS gradeId,A.dict_code AS dictCode,A.notice_type_code AS noticeTypeCode,A.sender_id AS senderId,A.sender_name AS senderName,A.receiver_id AS receiverId,A.receiver_ids AS receiverIds,A.receiver_group_id AS receiverGroupId,A.msg_group AS msgGroup,A.content_type AS contentType,A.title AS title,A.subject AS subject,A.content AS content,A.send_time AS sendTime,A.read_time AS readTime,A.read_status AS readStatus,A.conceal_level AS concealLevel,A.to_all AS toAll,A.expiry_date AS expiryDate,A.anonymous AS anonymous,A.is_top AS isTop,A.file_id AS fileId,A.link_url AS linkUrl,A.link_type AS linkType,A.link_id AS linkId,A.owner_id AS ownerId,A.owner_ids AS ownerIds,A.attr_decimal AS attrDecimal,A.attr_str AS attrStr,A.attr_str2 AS attrStr2,A.attr_int AS attrInt,A.attr_int2 AS attrInt2,A.sequence AS sequence,A.remark AS remark,A.created_at AS createdAt,A.created_by AS createdBy,A.updated_at AS updatedAt,A.updated_by AS updatedBy
,u.username AS userName ,d.dict_name AS NoticeType,u.serial AS receiverSerial
LEFT JOIN user u ON u.id = A.receiver_id LEFT JOIN dict d ON d.id = A.type_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM A
WHERE A.serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1
